description: Data was compiled from the original publications used in the Mitelman database. Patient demographics and disease data were manually curated for each assigned reference and case number.

fields.description: Age of subject. Often blank but can be a number between 0 and 100
fields.name: Age

fields.description: Case number
fields.name: CaseNo

fields.description: Numeric ID given to each CaseNo
fields.name: CaseOrder

fields.description: Country code
fields.name: Country

fields.description: Unique code indicating hereditary disease type as present in Koder table.
fields.name: HerDis

fields.description: Immunology flag which can be 'B', 'T', or null
fields.name: Immunology

fields.description: Unique code indicating the morphology type as present in Koder table.
fields.name: Morph

fields.description: Location where the case was created and recorded.
fields.name: Origin

fields.description: Deprecated field
fields.name: PatientID

fields.description: Deprecated field
fields.name: PatientName

fields.description: Unique code indicating the morphology type of the previous tumor as present in the Koder table.
fields.name: PrevMorph

fields.description: Unique code indicating the topography type of the previous tumor as present in the Koder table.
fields.name: PrevTopo

fields.description: One or more characters indicating previous treatment type(s) separated by commas. "C" means Chemotherapy, "O" means Other/Unknown, "R" menas Radiotherapy, and "S" means Surgery
fields.name: PrevTreat

fields.description: If the patient had a previous tumor (Y or null)
fields.name: PrevTum

fields.description: The race of a participant. "W" means White. "A" means Asian, "B" means Black, "O" means Other
fields.name: Race

fields.description: Reference number
fields.name: RefNo

fields.description: A case is categorized as 'Selected' (S) when reported because of a specific/unusual karyotypic feature; otherwise, the case is classified as 'Unselected' (U). "D" is possibly a typo.
fields.name: Series

fields.description: Patient sex
fields.name: Sex

fields.description: Specific hereditary disorder
fields.name: SpecHerDis

fields.description: Specific morphology
fields.name: SpecMorph

fields.description: Deprecated field
fields.name: SpecObs

fields.description: Unique code indicating the topography type as present in Koder table.
fields.name: Topo
